name: Wireless Bluetooth Headphones
description: Experience studio-grade sound with wide frequency response (20Hz–40kHz) and LDAC codec support for lossless audio streaming.
features:
balanced sound.
Custom EQ modes via the SoundMax app (Bass Boost
Blocks 95% of ambient noise for immersive listening.
Transparency Mode lets you hear surroundings without removing headphones.

Noise-reducing mic for clear calls and voice assistant support (Siri/Google).
